thread.title: 30 Dainty Pieces Of Jewelry To Buy Yourself For Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: 30 Dainty Pieces Of Jewelry To Buy Yourself For Valentine's Day

author: Treye Green
title: 30 Dainty Pieces Of Jewelry To Buy Yourself For Valentine's Day
text:
View this image ›
Zoe Burnett/BuzzFeed We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page.
ID: 10454302 1. A magical mermaid-scales pendant that will reveal your inner sea goddess. View this image ›
amazon.com Get one necklace from Amazon for $15.99 . Available in six colors.
ID: 10445125 2. A delicate pair of crystal hoops that are beyond gorgeous. View this image ›
amazon.com Get them from Amazon for $33.43+ . Available in two colors.
ID: 10445184 3. A darling mermaid charm bangle with stone accents. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $15+ . Available in two colors.
ID: 10445123 4. A set of silver and turquoise stacking rings that will upgrade any outfit. View this image ›
amazon.com Get the set of six from Amazon for $7.78 .
ID: 10445142 5. An affordably fancy strap watch that will prove your style is timeless. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $31.29+ . Available in six colors.
ID: 10445186 6. An EKG rhythm necklace that will completely steal your heart. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $0.69 . Available in two colors.
ID: 10445119 7. A pretty pair of bird and twig earrings that every nature lover will adore. etsy.com Get them from Shik Designs on Etsy for $24.99 .
ID: 10446500 8. A set of shimmering evil eye charm bracelets that will help keep the drama far away. ae.com Get the set of four from American Eagle for $13.12 .
ID: 10445131 9. A glittering crystal gemstone ring that will be an enchanting addition to your jewelry collection. amazon.com , amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $39 .
ID: 10446478 10. A cream and gold elephant watch that will stomp the wrist-wear competition. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $2.08+ .
ID: 10446473 11. A sterling silver horseshoe and wishbone necklace that will guarantee luck is on your side. us.asos.com Get it from Asos for $23 .
ID: 10445172 12. A pair of iridescent shark tooth earrings that will make everyone want to bite your style. View this image ›
modcloth.com Get them from Modcloth for $14.99 .
ID: 10446543 13. A cuff bracelet that will remind you of the infinite beauty of love. shop.nordstrom.com / Via Instagram/Mantra Band, shop.nordstrom.com Get it from Nordstrom for $25+ . Available in three colors.
ID: 10445127 14. A sleek octopus tentacles ring that you’ll have no issues being stuck with. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $12.66 .
ID: 10446474 15. A gorgeous white and gold watch that looks straight from the future. modcloth.com Get it from Modcloth for $35.99 .
ID: 10445180 16. A gleaming heart necklace you can personalize with your initial or the initial of a loved one. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $17.50 . Available in three colors.
ID: 10445107 17. A black cat ear cuff that is too adorable to bring you bad luck. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $2.99 .
ID: 10446485 18. A beautiful set of glitter bangles for an epic wrist party. View this image ›
us.topshop.com Get the set of eight from Topshop for $18 .
ID: 10445175 19. A set of gold stacking rings that are six kinds of fabulous. View this image ›
amazon.com Get the set of six from Amazon for $7.99 .
ID: 10445156 20. A sleek watch with gold detailing for those days all-black is the only option. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $12.97 .
ID: 10446479 21. A metallic bar pendant you can have hand-stamped with a meaningful name or location. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $18.50 . Available in three colors.
ID: 10445111 22. A delicate trio of stud earrings made from recycled sterling silver. View this image ›
etsy.com Get the set of three from Wild Fawn Jewellry on Etsy for $36 .
ID: 10445154 23. A gold-dipped heart and cross bracelet that may become your new fave. 1928.com / Via Instagram/1928 Jewelry, 1928.com Get it from 1928 Jewelry for $30 .
ID: 10445177 24. A reversible midi ring you can wear as a teardrop ring or row of crystals. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $14.20 . Available in two colors.
ID: 10446471 25. A tiny triangle necklace that has no bad angles. iamfy.co , iamfy.co Get it from Fy for $22 .
ID: 10445150 26. A darling pair of bee studs that will have all your friends buzzing. View this image ›
factory.jcrew.com Get them from J Crew Factory for $13.50 .
ID: 10445148 27. A dreamy silver and opal glass moon ring . ae.com Get it from American Eagle for $6.71 .
ID: 10446480 28. A perfectly worn-in cuff bracelet you will love forever. View this image ›
amazon.com / Via Instagram/Alex and Ani Get it from Amazon for $36.14 . Available in three colors.
ID: 10446504 29. A handmade knot ring that’s simply fierce. etsy.com Get it from Avnis on Esty for $15 .
ID: 10446492 30. And a tyrannosaurus fossil necklace that’s cuteness will never go extinct. modcloth.com Get it from Modcloth for $14.99 .
ID: 10445143 Want even more great product suggestions? Sign up for BuzzFeed’s Gift Guide Newsletter!
